All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddNewVehicleTest
Unit tests for adding new vehicles using the VehicleDao class.
Admin
Represents an Admin in the system with various attributes such as adminId, firstName, lastName, email, phoneNumber, userName, password, role, and joinDate.
AdminDao
This class provides methods to interact with the Admin database table.
AdminNotFoundException
Custom exception class for handling cases when an admin is not found.
AdminService
This class implements the IAdminService interface and provides methods to interact with the AdminDao class for admin-related operations.
AuthenticationException
Custom exception class for handling authentication-related errors.
AuthenticationService
This class implements the IAuthenticationService interface and provides methods for authenticating customers and admins.
AuthenticationTest
This class contains unit tests for customer authentication using the AuthenticationService class.
AvailableVehicleListTest
Unit tests for retrieving available vehicles using the VehicleService class.
CarConnectMain
This class contains the main method to run the CarConnect application.
Customer
Represents a customer entity with various attributes.
CustomerDao
This class provides methods to interact with the Customer database table.
CustomerNotFoundException
Custom exception class for handling cases when a customer is not found.
CustomerService
This class implements the ICustomerService interface and provides methods for customer-related operations.
DatabaseConnectionException
Custom exception class for handling database connection errors.
DBConnUtil
This utility class provides methods for managing database connections.
DBPropertyUtil
This utility class provides methods to retrieve database connection strings from property files.

InvalidInputException
Custom exception class for handling invalid input errors.

Reservation
Represents a Reservation entity with various attributes.
ReservationDao
This class provides methods to interact with the Reservation database table.
ReservationException
Custom exception class for handling reservation-related errors.
ReservationService
This class implements the IReservationService interface and provides methods for reservation-related operations.
Status
 
UpdateCustomerInformationTest
Unit tests for updating customer information using the CustomerDao class.
Vehicle
Represents a Vehicle entity with various attributes.
VehicleDao
This class provides methods to interact with the Vehicle database table.
VehicleDetailsUpdateTest
Unit tests for updating vehicle details using the VehicleService class.
VehicleListTest
Unit tests for fetching all vehicles using the VehicleDao class.
VehicleNotFoundException
Custom exception class for handling cases when a vehicle is not found.
VehicleService
Provides services related to vehicles such as retrieving available vehicles, updating vehicle details, adding new vehicles, removing vehicles, and fetching all vehicles.
